title: Book Jacket, "Bookjacket design for "Bread in the Wilderness" by Thomas Merton", 1953
medium: Lithography in black and orange ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover in the upper left corner in black ink: Lustig
Vertically down the right side: BREAD IN THE WILDERNESS
At lower left: Thomas Merton
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The cover has a pale yellow background with an image of a sculpted head printed in orange. The inside flaps discuss the book and other books by Thomas Merton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Jacket, "Bookjacket design for "Bread in the Wilderness" by Thomas Merton", 1953.
1953. Lithography in black and orange ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-166.
